head.title: Weekly Specials - Lidl Ireland

body.noscript: Note: Javascript is not enabled in your browser. Please enable javascript in your browser to continue

div.p: Sorry there were no stores found. Please try again

section.h1:
Please enter your details into one or more of the following fields so we can locate your nearest store
Find Your Nearest Store

h1.strong: In the selected branch unfortunately no NonFood is offered.

li.a: Monday, 09.12. - Choose High Tech Gifts from Monday 9th December
Monday, 09.12. - Choose Comfy Clothes from Monday 9th December
Thursday, 12.12. - Choose Gifts to Remember from Thursday 12th December
Monday, 16.12. - Choose To Pamper Yourself from Monday 16th December
Monday, 16.12. - Choose Brand New Kitchenware from Monday 16th December
Roast Turkey with Stuffing, Belotta Ham and Apple and Sprout Mash

li.p:
We are a successful chain of grocery stores, expanding strongly throughout Europe and beyond.
The cornerstone of our business and the key to our success is simplicity. Our aim is to buy and sell top quality products at the lowest possible price to our customers.
